abstract: The job cuts are expected to be made in the investment banking unit expanded by the acquisition of Merrill Lynch in 2008.
snippet: The job cuts are expected to be made in the investment banking unit expanded by the acquisition of Merrill Lynch in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Echoing the slowdown in activity that has hit Wall Street’s biggest institutions, Bank of America plans to cut several hundred jobs in its investment banking unit this week, according to employees.

headline.main: Layoffs Said to Be Near for Bank of America Unit
headline.print_headline: Layoffs Said to Be Near For Bank of America Unit

abstract: Echoing the slowdown in activity that has hit Wall Street’s biggest institutions, Bank of America plans to cut several hundred jobs in its investment banking unit this week, according to employees.
snippet: Echoing the slowdown in activity that has hit Wall Street’s biggest institutions, Bank of America plans to cut several hundred jobs in its investment banking unit this week, according to employees.
lead_paragraph: Echoing the slowdown in activity that has hit Wall Street’s biggest institutions, Bank of America plans to cut several hundred jobs in its investment banking unit this week, according to employees, Nelson D. Schwartz writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Layoffs Said to Be Near for BofA Unit

abstract: As many as 20 percent of hedge funds globally may be liquidated by the first quarter because smaller managers are starved for fees and new capital, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: As many as 20 percent of hedge funds globally may be liquidated by the first quarter because smaller managers are starved for fees and new capital, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: As many as 20 percent of hedge funds globally may be liquidated by the first quarter because smaller managers are starved for fees and new capital, Bloomberg News reported, citing Bank of America Corp.’s Merrill Lynch & Co. unit.

headline.main: Hedge-Fund Closure Could Reach 20%, Report Says
